short_summary: Procurement of 8 Boat Trailers for Zodiac Hurricane MK3
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure 8 Boat Trailers for 5 locations in Canada. The delivery time frame is 120 days from the contract award. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Note: This requirement contains controlled goods. Bidders must be registered with the Canadian Controlled Goods Program.
duration_in_months: This solicitation is for a short term contract which will last less than or equal to 2 months
full_summary:
# BOAT TRAILER FOR ZODIAC HURRICANE MK3
## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Requirement Summary
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to procure a boat trailer for Zodiac Hurricane MK3, as follows:
- Quantity: 8 units
- Delivery locations: 1 x Calgary, AB, 1 x London, ON, 2 x Dundurn, SK, 1 x Gagetown, NB, and 3 x Valcartier, QC
- Delivery time: 120 days from contract award

### Information
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on procurement.

The solicitation contains controlled goods under the Controlled Goods Program (CGP). Suppliers must be registered under the CGP.

Documents must be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information
To submit bids, please email:
`DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca`

### Bid Description and Deadline
This is a procurement opportunity under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
Please submit bids electronically to the above email address by the closing date for proposals, October 30th, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

### Attachment
Links to the RFP document are available below:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/13200/en-rfp-w8476-246772-a---amendment-004---original.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/13200/fr-ddp-w8476-246772-a---amendment-005---original.pdf

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this RFP are:
* Lowest price

 Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): 2330
United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC): 25181700

References:
Controlled Goods Program (CGP): http://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/dmc-cgd/apropos-about/inscrptn-rgstrtn-eng.html

 Note: this RFP has expired, no further bids can be submitted.
